# Pie chart for sex-wise participation
plt.figure(figsize=(6,6))
plt.title('Gender-wise participation')
plt.pie(gender_counts,labels=gender_counts.index,autopct='%1.1f%%')

source.6d9e0403: ## Find Sports played during Winter and Summer Olympics
source.ca2022ca:
#### 1) From the years, we see that the data covers the 1st Olympics in 1896 to the 2016 Rio Olympics
#### 2) The average age of athletes is 25 yrs. The youngest ever athlete is 10 yrs old, the oldest ever is 97 yrs old
#### 3) The average height is 175 cms. The shortest one was 127 cm, and tallest one was 226 cm.
#### 4) The average weight is 70 kg. The lightest athlete was 25kg, and heaviest athlete was 214 kg.
